actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance for the establishment of the Hiram Rhodes Academic Science Complex at Alcorn State University in Claiborne County, Mississippi.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide financial assistance to Alcorn State University to establish the Hiram Rhodes Revels Academic Science Complex. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance for the establishment of the Hiram Rhodes Academic Science Complex at Alcorn State University in Claiborne County, Mississippi.
